title: My account got hacked can i get it back?
body:
My computer got hacked by a virus, and i lost my account, my password and email got hacked as well, and now i cant log on to my account.
if i can provide things that i am the owner of this account, am i be able to get it back?

replies.body:
Yes. The longer you wait, the less likely you'll get it back, though.

[Go look at this page.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694)
about 1 month ago, is that alright?

That's a pretty long time. Like, a really long time. When did you find out about this?

Not that it matters, now. You've at least already sent in the ticket, right?
